description.information: We only require emails for issuing rewards and secure wallet recovery. Your transactions are safeguarded on the Polygon blockchain network, ensuring data integrity. We have no access to or control over your tokens or personal information.
description.form: We only require emails for issuing rewards and secure wallet recovery. Your transactions are safeguarded on the Polygon blockchain network, ensuring data integrity. We have no access to or control over your tokens or personal information.

success.verification: A verification email has been sent to example@email.com. Please check your mailbox to verify the account before you claim your reward.

error.form: Invalid email format. Email must contain @

resetEmail.title: Check your email
resetEmail.description: After you submit a new email address, we will send you a confirmation email.

PreferencesLabels.title: Your Preferences
PreferencesLabels.specialOffers: Allow brands to send you special offers
PreferencesLabels.shareData: Share your usage data with brands
PreferencesLabels.shareRewards: Share data only if rewards are included

WalletLabels.title: Your Wallet Keys
WalletLabels.description: The secret phrase is the key to your wallet. Never share your secret phrase with anyone, store it securely!

description.download: This will download a TXT file containing the wallet information onto your device encrypted with the password.
description.meta: You can use this TXT file to import the account in MetaMask using the same password.

PolicyLabels.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to the Decentralised ID platform ("Platform"), provided by QX Ventures, Inc. ("QX Ventures," "we," "us," or "our"). This document outlines our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. By accessing and using the Platform, you agree to comply with these terms and policies. Please read them carefully.

dataControl.title: 3. Data Control
dataControl.description: Users have full control over their data on the Platform. We do not collect or store any personal data without your explicit consent.

dataUsage.title: 4. Data Usage
dataUsage.description: While interacting with our products, users may leave traces of usability data.

delete.title: Woho, There!
delete.description: Once you delete your ID, there is no way of getting it back. Make sure you want to do this. You will permanently lose access to your purchase history, rewards and personal data.
delete.label: Enable this if you agree

funds.title: You Have Funds!
funds.description: Regrettably, accounts containing reward tokens cannot be deleted. You have the option to retain your account, contribute the funds to charity, or return them to the network. How would you like to proceed?

preferences.title: Your Preferences Have Been Updated
preferences.error: An error occurred while updating your preferences

deleteId.title: Account ID Has Been Deleted
deleteId.error: An error occurred while deleting your account ID

changeEmail.title: Email has been changed
changeEmail.error: An error occurred while changing your email

changeUserInfo.title: Profile Information has been updated
changeUserInfo.error: An error occurred while updating your profile information

backupWallet.title: Wallet Backup has been downloaded
backupWallet.error: An error occurred while downloading your wallet backup

DIDLabels.title: Decentralized Identifiers (DIDs)
DIDLabels.description: Manage your decentralized identifiers and their current status.

modal.title: Add a new DID
modal.description: Add a new Decentralized Identifier (DID) by entering a name and DID value below.
modal.label: Add New DID

notFound.title: No DIDs Found
notFound.description: You haven't created any decentralized identifiers yet.
